Desc.entry: Fully equipped studio. All teachers are fully qualified and extensively trained in the methods of BKS Iyengar. Classes at all levels including introductory, beginners, general and intermediate. Booking forms are available on web site.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 6.15-7.30pm (beginners plus), 6.30-7.45pm (introductory/beginners), 7.45-9.30pm (intermediate), Tues 11.30am-12.30pm (older and stiffer), 4.15-5.30pm (therapeutic), 6-7.30pm (general), Wed 9.30-11am (women's), 6.30-8pm (general), 8-9.15pm (beginners), Thurs 6-7.15pm (beginners), Sun 10.30-11.45am (beginners)
